title: Motta rues Juventus mistakes in first Serie A defeat of the season
description: Thiago Motta said a string of defensive errors led to Juventus’ first Serie A defeat of the season after falling to a 2-1 loss against Napoli on Saturday. Motta watched on as on-loan Paris Saint-Germain striker Randal Kolo Muani’s first goal for the club was cancelled out by strikes from Frank Anguissa and Romelu Lukaku. title: Paris Saint-Germain 1-1 Reims: Champions frustrated on home turf
description: Paris Saint-Germain endured another difficult encounter against Reims at the Parc des Princes after being held to a 1-1 draw in Ligue 1 on Saturday. PSG have now failed to win any of their last three home league games against Reims, last doing so against a single opponent in the competitor against Bordeaux between August […] The post Paris Saint-Germain 1-1 Reims: Champions frustrated on home turf appeared first on Soccer News.
